resources.string: This device is not connected to bluetooth. The data you submit will be stored locally, but not sent to the scouting laptop.\nWould you like to connect now?
Please talk to Telon, Carter, or other scouting leader

An error occurred connecting to Bluetooth.\nPlease check that Bluetooth is enabled on this device, that the server is running on the scouting computer, and that you have selected that computer from the dropdown.\nIf errors persist, please get Carter for help
